name: ocelot-social
description: Free and open source software program code available to run social networks.
author: ocelot.social Community

scripts.release: yarn version --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks --no-commit && auto-changelog --latest-version $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") && cd backend && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks --no-commit --new-version $(node -p -e "require('./../package.json').version") && cd ../frontend && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks --no-commit --new-version $(node -p -e "require('./../package.json').version") && cd ../webapp && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks --no-commit --new-version $(node -p -e "require('./../package.json').version") && cd ../webapp/maintenance/source && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks --no-commit --new-version $(node -p -e "require('./../../../package.json').version")
